attributes.attribute: With refined styling and a streamlined profile Advance is packed with new design innovations. Available as double sided system this removable cassette banner has been specially designed for maximum convenience and ease of use.

2130mm max high x 800mm or 1000mm wide visible graphic area (add 300mm to allow for roller mechanism;Can be used as a single or double sided banner;Available in anodised silver with charcoal grey end caps;Drop-in cassette(s) designed to accommodate graphic media up to 450 microns thick<FONT color=#ff0000>*</FONT> ; Universal Grippa/Self adhesive top rail;Secure slide in graphic system;Ratchet tensioner;Twist & Lock telescopic pole;Supplied with quality foam padded carry bag;Add your own branding using the slide in graphic channels along the banner base;<FONT color=#ff0000>*Please test your substrate suitability before use</FONT>
Discovery is a cost-effective single-sided cassette banner packed with new design innovations

2100mm max high x 800 - 1000<FONT color=#ff0000><STRONG>**</STRONG></FONT>mm wide visible graphic area (add 300mm to allow for roller mechanism;Available in anodised silver;Twist-out foot with stylish end mouldings;Drop-in cassette designed to accommodate graphic media up to 450 microns thick<FONT color=#ff0000>*</FONT>;Universal Grippa/Self adhesive top rail;Secure slide in graphic system;Ratchet tensioner;Hybrid pole, part bungee and part telescopic;Supplied with quality foam padded carry bag;Add your own branding using the slide in graphic channel along the banner base;<FONT color=#ff0000>*Please test your substrate suitability before use

With refined styling and a streamlined profile Imagine is packed with new design innovations. This banner is also our most popular removable cassette roller system and has been specially designed for maximum convenience and ease of use.

<FONT color=#ff0000>Please note that the 5% price freeze is for the 800mm wide only</FONT>;2130mm max high x 800 - 1000mm wide visible graphic area (add 300mm to allow for roller mechanism;Available in anodised silver;Charcoal grey end caps;Drop-in cassette designed to accommodate graphic media up to 450 microns thick<FONT color=#ff0000>*</FONT>;Universal Grippa/Self adhesive top rail;Secure slide in graphic system;Ratchet tensioner;Twist & Lock telescopic pole;Supplied with quality foam padded carry bag;Add your own branding using the slide in graphic channel along the banner base;<FONT color=#ff0000>*Please test your substrate suitability before use</FONT>
